found_issues.title: [FIRRTL] Canonicalize infinite loop
found_issues.reasoning: Very recent canonicalize infinite loop issue (FIRRTL dialect). Shows canonicalize entering indefinite loop during optimization. While different dialect, identical problem pattern: canonicalize pass stuck in infinite loop. Trigger: firrtl.regreset + firrtl.bits + constant folding pattern.

found_issues.title: [Comb] AddOp canonicalizer hangs in an infinite loop
found_issues.reasoning: Closed canonicalize infinite loop in comb.add. Complex control flow creates recursive add operation that canonicalizer expands infinitely. Pattern: recursive operation + canonicalizer + infinite expansion. Different dialect but same canonicalize hang mechanism.

found_issues.title: [Comb] Infinite loop in OrOp folder
found_issues.reasoning: Recent infinite loop in OrOp folder (Comb dialect). Similar timeout/infinite loop class of bug. Appears to be canonicalize-related folding issue on bitwise operations.

found_issues.title: [Comb] Concat/extract canonicalizer crashes on loop
found_issues.reasoning: Canonicalizer crash on cyclic dependencies in Comb dialect (concat/extract). Mentions 'loop' behavior in canonicalizer. Different operations but same infinite loop class.

found_issues.title: [LLHD][Arc] Indexing and slicing lowering from Verilog to LLVM IR
found_issues.reasoning: LLHD + canonicalize issue. Uses same pipeline: llhd-sig2reg → canonicalize. Fails with non-pure operation error after canonicalization. Related area: LLHD lowering with struct-like types (array indexing similar to struct field operations).

found_issues.title: [Moore][Arc][LLHD] Moore to LLVM lowering issues
found_issues.reasoning: LLHD + canonicalize pipeline issue. Uses: llhd-sig2reg → canonicalize. Different error (legalization failure) but same problematic pass sequence. Shows LLHD-to-LLVM lowering is fragile with canonicalize.

found_issues.title: [MooreToCore] Unexpected topological cycle after importing generated verilog
found_issues.reasoning: Cyclic SSA dependency created by Moore→Core conversion. Shows similar pattern: struct/concat operations creating cycles. Different lowering path but demonstrates canonicalize can create circular references.

found_issues.title: comb::ExtractOp::canonicalize is very slow
found_issues.reasoning: Canonicalize slowness/performance issue on extract operations. Related to timeout class of problems but documented as performance rather than infinite loop.

top_issue.title: [FIRRTL] Canonicalize infinite loop
top_issue.reason: Most recent and most similar: canonicalize entering infinite loop with timeout behavior

detailed_analysis.match_quality: This bug appears NOVEL but HIGHLY RELATED to ongoing canonicalize stability issues
key_differences: This bug: LLHD dialect (SystemVerilog Moore conversion), llhd-sig2reg pass creates circular SSA
Issue #9560: FIRRTL dialect, canonicalize loop on constant patterns
Issue #8865: Comb dialect, AddOp canonicalizer infinite loop on control flow
Pattern: All involve canonicalize pass entering infinite loop, but different root causes
detailed_analysis.shared_root_cause_class: canonicalize pass infinite loop detection/prevention needs improvement
detailed_analysis.recommendation_justification: The specific trigger (partial struct field assignment + llhd-sig2reg creating cyclic SSA + canonicalize) appears novel. However, canonicalize infinite loops are a known systemic issue in CIRCT. Human review needed to determine if this is: (1) new specific bug, (2) variant of #9560/#8865/#8022, or (3) duplicate with different manifestation.
